column6: "PLANET X" pt. 3 (of 5) The shocking mystery threat revealed in issue #146 continues to take its toll upon Professor Xavier and the X-Men. With the team broken and disbanded, are their chances for survival dwindling? 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.25
column8: | penciller (cover):Phil Jimenez | inker:Andy Lanning | writer:Grant Morrison
